newsitem.title: GREECE: CHRYSOHOIDIS EXPECTED TO ANNOUNCE FOOD PRICE DEAL.
newsitem.headline: CHRYSOHOIDIS EXPECTED TO ANNOUNCE FOOD PRICE DEAL.

text.p: Deputy Development Minister Mihalis Chrysohoidis is expected to make an announcement on food prices later on Thursday following talks with food producers and retailers, a development ministry spokeswoman said.

Chrysohoidis has been closeted in talks with representatives of food producers and supermarkets following claims by producers on Tuesday that leading supermarket retailers were taking advantage of their monopoly to increase their profits at the expense of producers.
Unconfirmed media reports said food producers had promised to maintain prices at current levels until the end of the year. --Maria Petrakis, Athens Newsroom +301 3311812-4
